text: Kot Adu Junction railway station (, ) is located in Kot Addu, District Muzaffargarh, Pakistan. ==See also== * List of railway stations in Pakistan * Pakistan Railways ==References== ==External links== *Official Web Site of Pakistan Railways Category:Railway stations in Muzaffargarh District Category:Railway stations on Sher Shah–Kot Addu Branch Line Category:Railway stations on Kotri–Attock Railway Line (ML 2)
title: Kot Adu Junction railway station
